com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.name: CDS Med Order Encoded

properties.property: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:urn="urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adapter:fact"> <soap:Body> <storeMedicationFactEvent xmlns="http://dss.kmr.nhinc.fha.hhs.gov/"> <fact> <urn:primaryKey>${patientien}</urn:primaryKey> <urn:historical>false</urn:historical> <urn:id> <urn:codeSystem>IEN</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:value>${patientien}</urn:value> <urn:displayable>false</urn:displayable> </urn:id> <urn:sourceSystem>${message.source}</urn:sourceSystem> <urn:patientId> <urn:codeSystem>IEN</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:value>${patientien}o</urn:value> <urn:displayable>false</urn:displayable> </urn:patientId> <!--type: string--> <urn:freeTextProductName>sceptra tenens</urn:freeTextProductName> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:freeTextBrandName>turbine corripuit scopuloque</urn:freeTextBrandName> <!--Optional:--> <urn:codedProductName> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>flammato secum dea</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>profundum quippe ferant</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>nubibus ignem disiecitque</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>ac vinclis et</urn:label> </urn:codedProductName> <!--Optional:--> <urn:codedBrandName> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>rapidum iaculata e</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>caelumque profundum</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>circum claustra</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>coniunx una</urn:label> </urn:codedBrandName> <urn:productConcentration>circum claustra fremunt</urn:productConcentration> <urn:codedTypeOfMedication> <urn:codeSystem>${drugcodingsystem}</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName>${drugcodingsystem}</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>${drugid}</urn:code> <urn:label>sed pater</urn:label> </urn:codedTypeOfMedication> <urn:codedStatusOfMedication> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>talia flammato secum</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>austris aeoliam</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>sciret dare</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>dare iussus</urn:label> </urn:codedStatusOfMedication> <urn:sigFreeText>${SIG}t</urn:sigFreeText> <!--Optional:--> <urn:codedSigRoute> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>infixit acuto</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>tenens mollitque animos</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>montis insuper</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>habenas ipsa</urn:label> </urn:codedSigRoute> <!--Optional:--> <urn:sigDose> <!--type: string--> <urn:value>mollitque animos</urn:value> <!--type: string--> <urn:unit>iovisque et</urn:unit> </urn:sigDose> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:sigMedicationStopped>soror et coniunx</urn:sigMedicationStopped> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:freeTextIndication>iunonis adorat</urn:freeTextIndication> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:patientInstructions>adorat praeterea</urn:patientInstructions> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:reaction>illum exspirantem transfixo</urn:reaction> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn:sigCodedVehicle> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>aris imponet honorem</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>aris imponet</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>premere et</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>insuper altos</urn:label> </urn:sigCodedVehicle> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:sigDoseIndicator>ferant rapidi secum</urn:sigDoseIndicator> <urn:order> <!--type: string--> <urn:orderNumber>${ordernumber}</urn:orderNumber> <!--type: int--> <urn:fills>3</urn:fills> <!--type: int--> <urn:reFills>${numofrefills}</urn:reFills> <urn:quantityOrdered> <!--type: string--> <urn:value>vasto rex</urn:value> <!--type: string--> <urn:unit>flammato secum</urn:unit> </urn:quantityOrdered> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:orderExpirationDateTime>tempestatesque sonoras</urn:orderExpirationDateTime> <!-- TODO: Deal wth ORC-9/ORC-15 issue --> <urn:orderDateTime>${orderdatetime}</urn:orderDateTime> <!-- TODO: Deal with ORC-12 promoite to OBR-16 --> <urn:orderingProvider> <urn:firstName>${orderingprovfirstname}</urn:firstName> <urn:middleName>${orderingprovmiddlename}</urn:middleName> <urn:familyName>${orderingprovlastname}</urn:familyName> <urn:suffix> <urn:code>${orderingprovfsuffix}</urn:code> <urn:label>${orderingprovfsuffix}</urn:label> </urn:suffix> </urn:orderingProvider> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:fullfillmentInstructions>vinclis et</urn:fullfillmentInstructions> </urn:order> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn:fullfillment> <!--type: string--> <urn:prescriptionNumber>${perscriptionnumber}</urn:prescriptionNumber> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:dispensingPharmacy>antro luctantis ventos</urn:dispensingPharmacy> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:dispensingPharmacyLocation>sciret dare</urn:dispensingPharmacyLocation> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:dispenseDate>luctantis ventos</urn:dispenseDate> <urn:quantityDispensed> <!--type: string--> <urn:value>ipsa iovis</urn:value> <!--type: string--> <urn:unit>aris imponet</urn:unit> </urn:quantityDispensed> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: int--> <urn:fillNumber>3</urn:fillNumber> <!--Optional:--> <urn:fillStatus> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>imperio premit</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>arce sceptra tenens</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>ni faciat</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>circum claustra fremunt</urn:label> </urn:fillStatus> </urn:fullfillment> </fact> </storeMedicationFactEvent> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: eventid
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.10'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('eventid', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: sendingapp
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.3']['HD.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('sendingapp', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: sendingfacility
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.4']['HD.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('sendingfacility', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: patientien
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.PATIENT']['PID']['PID.3']['CX.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('patientien', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: form
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = "UnMapped"; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('form', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: SIG
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.19']['XCN.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('SIG', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: qty
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXE']['RXE.10'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('qty', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: numofrefills
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXE']['RXE.12'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('numofrefills', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: route
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RDE_O01.OBSERVATION']['RXR']['RXR.1']['CE.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('route', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: medien
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXE']['RXE.2']['CE.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('medien', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderdatetime
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.9'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderdatetime', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugid
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXE']['RXE.2']['CE.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugid', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: dispunits
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXE']['RXE.5']['CE.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('dispunits', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: dosage
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXE']['RXE.3'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('dosage', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugcodingsystem
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXE']['RXE.2']['CE.3'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugcodingsystem', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: ordernumber
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.2']['EI.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('ordernumber', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: perscriptionnumber
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXE']['RXE.15'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('perscriptionnumber', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugNDC
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RDE_O01.OBSERVATION']['NTE']['NTE.3'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugNDC', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovfirstname
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.3']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovfirstname', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovlastname
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.2']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovlastname', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovmiddlename
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.4']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovmiddlename', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovfsuffix
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.5']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovfsuffix', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovid
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.1']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovid', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: ordereffectivedatetime
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.15'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('ordereffectivedatetime', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugname
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RDE_O01.ORDER_DETAIL']['RXO']['RXO.1']['CE.2'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugname', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: Dateconversion

transformer.inboundTemplate: MSH|^~\&|CHCS\RX|A1401|DATAGATE|3M|20070726070649.1-0400||RDE^O01|A1401-2610174|P|2.3||||| PID|30354||68767^^^F3753|20/408-80-0204|SMITH^BABY GIRL^^^^||20100601140200|F||C|111 TEST AVE^^SPRINGFIELD^OR^97406^US||424.110.0512|424.166.5583|||||608-80-0204||| ORC|11|971112-11553^|WI6207142|^|11||||19971112142000|^^^^^^^|^^^^^^^|P7777^QWACK^CALLMEA^J^PA^^^|||19971112142000|^^^^^||^^^^^|P7777^QWACK^CALLMEA^J^PA^^^ RXO|Drug Code^Drug Name^Name of Coding System|Give Min|Give Max|Giev Units^Give Units Text^Code Sys|Dosage Form Id^Dosage Form Text^Code Sys|Instructions Id^Instructions Txt^Code Sys|Admin Inst Id^Administration Instructions Txt^Code Sys|Point of Care|Allow Subs?|Req Disp Code Id^Req Disp Code Text^Code Sys|Req Disp Amt|Req Disp Unit Id^Req Disp Unit Text|Num Refills|Provider DEA Id Number^Provider Last^Given^MI|Pharmacist Id Number^Pharmacist Last^Given^MI RXE|1^SCOM^^19971112142000.2-0500^19971212142000.2-0500^^^TT PP #60 RF0|830^^DOD|800||MG^^^^^|||||60|^^^^^|0|||WI6207142|0||19971112000100.4-0500 RXR|PO NTE|1||Med Type: O<E> NTE|2||Dispensing Location:REID DISPENSARY (MOD)<E> NTE|3||Days of Supply:30<E> NTE|4||RX_CLINIC:EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT,WHMC<E> NTE|5||NDC_NUMBER:53746-0137-05<E> NTE|6||NONE

com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.postprocessingScript: // This script executes once after a message has been processed return;
